sect1.title: Jena
sect1.para: The RDFBean Jena integration works on top of the Graph interface. It supports in it's current form no named contexts and no inferencing. Querydsl support is also not yet supported.

sect2.title: Getting started
sect2.para: To construct a Repository instance using Jena invoke the JenaRepository constructor with a Model or Graph instance.

sect2.title: Support for named graphs
sect2.para: Support for named graphs is missing since Jena doesn't support it natively. Supporting it via the NG4J project is on the roadmap.
